name: GunForce
description: GunForce: Battle Fire Engulfed Terror Island (ガンフォース, Ganfosu), or simply titled as GunForce, is a side-scrolling action shooting game produced by Irem for the arcades in 1991. The game was later ported by Bits Studios and published by Irem for the Super NES in 1992. It received a sequel titled GunForce II, originally known in Japan as Geo Storm.
